TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Panel extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl implements class System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ITemplateable
Public Class Panel Inherits MobileControl Implements ITemplateable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供容器用于组织移动 Web 窗体页中的控件。

span.span: Provides a container for organizing controls in a mobile Web forms page.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板是可以嵌套的容器控件。Panels are container controls that can be nested. 由该面板中包含的控件继承面板上设置的属性。Attributes set on a panel are inherited by the controls that are contained in that panel. 可用于一个面板任意以下函数：You can use a panel for any of the following functions: - 将控件分组逻辑上，以便他们可以显示或隐藏。Grouping controls logically so that they can be shown or hidden. - 定义一个方便的容器，可以创建或删除动态控件。Defining a convenient container where controls can be created or removed dynamically. - 使用单个点来将样式应用到一组控件，通过将其设置面板上属性。Using a single point to apply style attributes to a set of controls, by setting them on the panel. 因为样式继承适用于面板中，可以由该面板中包含的控件继承面板设置的属性。Because style inheritance applies to panels, attributes that are set on a panel can be inherited by controls that are contained in that panel. - 提供有关哪些控件放在一起时分页到 ASP.NET 页框架的信息。Providing information to the ASP.NET page framework about which controls to keep together when paginating. 默认情况下，面板中的内容都将显示在一个页面。By default, the contents of a panel are kept together on a page. 你可以通过设置修改此行为面板的属性。You can modify this behavior by setting the property for the panel. 可以包含文字文本以及其伴随的标记的文本内容在。You can include literal text together with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[文字文本在窗体标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e)。For more information, see [Literal Text Inside Form Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在页面加载过程中设置面板的属性以及如何定义函数以操作面板的属性，以便它们响应命令单击。The following code example demonstrates how to set properties for a panel during page load and how to define functions to manipulate properties for a panel so that they respond to command clicks. 在页面加载该代码还会查找并修改第二个面板中的特定于设备的内容模板内的标签。At page load, the code also looks for and modifies a label within a device-specific content template in a second panel. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 你还需要将此部分添加到你的 Web.config 文件：You will also need to add this section to your Web.config file:

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，该属性确定是否在控件后呈现附加尾随换行符。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.

summary.span: 此换行符使后续内容从下一行开始。

span.span: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.

summary.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 返回包含设备特定的内容的面板。

span.span: Returns a panel containing device-specific content.

summary.span: 必须定义一个内容模板并选用于目标设备。

span.span: A content template must be defined and chosen for the target device.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用加载页面时查找控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to find a control when the page loads. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 你还需要将此部分添加到你的 Web.config 文件：You will also need to add this section to your Web.config file:

public: override void CreateDefaultTemplatedUI(bool doDataBind);

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果实例化模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常在第一次请求时发生），则设置为 。

span.span: Set to if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果模板不能绑定到数据，而需要根据视图状态进行填充（通常在后续回发时发生），则设置为 。

span.span: Set to if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 由设备适配器调用，以创建控件的默认模板化用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Called by device adapters to create the default templated user interface (UI) for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体分页发生后，将引发事件。The event is raised after form pagination occurs. > [!NOTE] > 即使属性设置为`false`，如果窗体的仍会发生分页属性设置。Even if the property is set to `false`, pagination can still occur if a form's property is set. > [!NOTE] > 若要允许中的分页方式控件在窗体中，您必须设置到`true`窗体和面板中。To allow pagination in a control within a form, you must set to `true` in both the form and the panel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例，对页，进行分页的设备上查看时显示如何分页包含更多控件，而不能在一页上显示一个面板面板上允许用户访问的所有项。The following code example, when viewed on a device that paginates the pages, shows how a panel containing more controls than will fit on one page is paginated to allow users access to all items on the panel. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobilePanelSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/vb/Default2.aspx#3)]
